name: Nature Green
description: 自然からインスパイアされた落ち着きのあるグリーンテーマ
use_cases: 健康・ウェルネスアプリ
エディケーションツール

button.primary: bg-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-700 active:bg-primary-800 text-white font-medium rounded-lg px-5 py-2.5 shadow-sm transition-all duration-200
button.secondary: bg-secondary-100 hover:bg-secondary-200 text-secondary-900 font-medium rounded-lg px-5 py-2.5 transition-colors duration-200
button.outline: border-2 border-primary-500 text-primary-700 hover:bg-primary-50 font-medium rounded-lg px-5 py-2.5 transition-colors duration-200

card.default: bg-white border border-neutral-200 rounded-2xl shadow-sm p-6
card.nature: bg-gradient-to-br from-primary-50 to-secondary-50 border border-primary-200 rounded-2xl shadow-md p-6

input.default: border-2 border-primary-200 rounded-lg px-4 py-2.5 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-400 focus:border-primary-400 transition-all duration-200
input.error: border-2 border-error-400 rounded-lg px-4 py-2.5 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-error-400

badge.primary: bg-primary-100 text-primary-800 text-sm font-semibold px-3 py-1 rounded-full
badge.secondary: bg-secondary-100 text-secondary-800 text-sm font-semibold px-3 py-1 rounded-full
badge.success: bg-success-100 text-success-800 text-sm font-semibold px-3 py-1 rounded-full
badge.info: bg-accent-100 text-accent-800 text-sm font-semibold px-3 py-1 rounded-full
